import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { RouterOutlet, RouterLink, RouterLinkActive } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterOutlet, RouterLink, RouterLinkActive], templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Meeting Planner'; }
